00060 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::IsServiceLocked( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00061 {
00062         if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00063         {
00064                 return false;
00065         }
00066                 
00067         mutexServicesUsed.EnterMutex();
00068         if ( ServicesUsed.IsDefined( ServiceName ) )
00069         {
00070                 mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00071                 // OmiscidTrace( "     '%s' is locked.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00072                 return true;
00073         }
00074 
00075         mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00076         // OmiscidTrace( "     '%s' is not locked.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00077         return false;
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::LockService( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00081 {
00082         if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00083         {
00084                 return false;
00085         }
00086                 
00087         mutexServicesUsed.EnterMutex();
00088         if ( ServicesUsed.IsDefined( ServiceName ) )
00089         {
00090                 mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00091                 // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' is already set.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00092                 return false;
00093         }
00094 
00095         ServicesUsed[ServiceName] = SimpleString::EmptyString;  // identical to ServicesUsed[ServiceName] = NULL
00096         // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' set.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00097 
00098         mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00099 
00100         return true;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void WaitForDnsSdServices::UnlockService( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00104 {
00105         if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00106         {
00107                 return;
00108         }
00109                 
00110         mutexServicesUsed.EnterMutex();
00111         ServicesUsed.Undefine( ServiceName );
00112         mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00113 
00114         // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' removed.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00115         return;
00116 }

00119 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE SearchService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00120         uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *fullname, const char *hosttarget, uint16_t port,
00121         uint16_t txtLen, const char *txtRecord, void *context )
00122 {
00123         SearchService * MyThis = (SearchService *)context;
00124 
00125         // Some error occurs or a service is removed...
00126         if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00127                 return;
00128 
00129         SimpleString FullName = fullname;
00130         FullName.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
00131 
00132         // Do we already consider this service ?
00133         if ( MyThis->Parent->IsServiceLocked(FullName) )
00134         {
00135                 // yes, so exit
00136                 return;
00137         }
00138 
00139         // Call the callback
00140         if ( MyThis->CallBack )
00141         {
00142                 if ( MyThis->CallBack( FullName.GetStr(), hosttarget, ntohs(port), txtLen, txtRecord, MyThis->UserData) == false )
00143                 {
00144                         return;
00145                 }
00146         }
00147                 
00148         // We lock the full service Name to prevent multiple use of the same instance
00149         // of a service...
00150         if ( MyThis->Parent->LockService( FullName ) == false )
00151         {
00152                 // already used...
00153                 return;
00154         }
00155 
00156         // Fill the service informations
00157         MyThis->CompleteServiceName = FullName;
00158         MyThis->HostName = hosttarget;
00159         MyThis->Port = ntohs( port );
00160         MyThis->Properties.ImportTXTRecord( txtLen, txtRecord );
00161         MyThis->IsResolved = true;
00162 
00163         ++MyThis->Parent->NbServicesReady;
00164 }

00167 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE SearchService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00168         uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *serviceName, const char *replyType,
00169         const char *replyDomain, void *context )
00170 {
00171         if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00172                 return;
00173         
00174         SearchService * MyThis = (SearchService *)context;
00175 
00176         SimpleString FullName = serviceName;
00177         FullName.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
00178 
00179         if ( flags & kDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00180         {
00181                 if ( MyThis->IsResolved )
00182                 {
00183                         // Not me, I am already resolved...
00184                         return;
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 // If the search name == 0, we do check for every service, in all other case, we compare
00188                 // The search name with the current service
00189                 if ( MyThis->SearchName.IsEmpty() || strncasecmp( (char*)MyThis->SearchName.GetStr(), (char*)FullName.GetStr(), MyThis->SearchName.GetLength() ) == 0 )
00190                 {
00191                         // A new service in the list, resolve it to see if it is the searched one...
00192                         DNSServiceRef Ref;
00193 
00194                         if ( DNSServiceResolve( &Ref, 0, interfaceIndex, serviceName, replyType, replyDomain, SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply, context ) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00195                         {
00196                                 DNSServiceProcessResult( Ref );
00197                                 DNSServiceRefDeallocate( Ref );
00198                         }
00199                 }
00200         }
00201         else
00202         {
00203                 // We need to say that the service is no longer present
00204                 // Am I this service ? a service name is unique !!!
00205                 if ( MyThis->Name == serviceName ) 
00206                 {
00207                         // Doms: I am not sure, we can not have a "remove" before an "add" operation, just to prevent
00208                         // problems
00209                         if ( MyThis->IsResolved )
00210                         {
00211                 // Ok, I am not here anymore...
00212                                 MyThis->IsResolved = false;
00213                                 // For my parent, there is one service
00214                                 --MyThis->Parent->NbServicesReady;
00215                                 // Unlock the service to be completed...
00216                                 MyThis->Parent->UnlockService( FullName );
00217                         }
00218                 }
00219         }
00220 }

00222 void SearchService::DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( DNSServiceFlags flags, const DnsSdService& CurrentService )
00223 {
00224         // printf( "%u;", GetTickCount() );
00225         if ( flags & kDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00226         {
00227                 if ( IsResolved )
00228                 {
00229                         // Not me, I am already resolved...
00230                         return;
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 // We do not need to make \032 modification...
00234                 SimpleString FullName = CurrentService.CompleteServiceName;
00235 
00236                 // If the search name == 0, we do check for every service, in all other case, we compare
00237                 // The search name with the current service
00238                 if ( SearchName.IsEmpty() || strncasecmp( (char*)SearchName.GetStr(), (char*)FullName.GetStr(), SearchName.GetLength() ) == 0 )
00239                 {
00240                         // Do we already consider this service ?
00241                         if ( Parent->IsServiceLocked(FullName) )
00242                         {
00243                                 // yes, so exit
00244                                 return;
00245                         }
00246 
00247                         // Call the callback
00248                         if ( CallBack )
00249                         {
00250                                 if ( CallBack( FullName.GetStr(), CurrentService.HostName.GetStr(), CurrentService.Port,
00251                                         (uint16_t)CurrentService.Properties.GetTXTRecordLength(), CurrentService.Properties.ExportTXTRecord(),
00252                                         UserData) == false )
00253                                 {
00254                                         return;
00255                                 }
00256                         }
00257                                 
00258                         // We lock the full service Name to prevent multiple use of the same instance
00259                         // of a service...
00260                         if ( Parent->LockService( FullName ) == false )
00261                         {
00262                                 // already used...
00263                                 return;
00264                         }
00265 
00266                         // Fill the service informations
00267                         CompleteServiceName = FullName;
00268                         HostName = CurrentService.HostName;
00269                         Port = CurrentService.Port;
00270                         Properties = CurrentService.Properties;
00271                         IsResolved = true;
00272 
00273                         ++Parent->NbServicesReady;
00274                 }
00275         }
00276         else
00277         {
00278                 // remove
00279         }
00280 }
00281 
00282 bool SearchService::StartSearch( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eRegType, WaitForDnsSdServices * eParent, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack, void * eUserData )
00283 {
00284         if ( DNSSDConnection == true || (!eName.IsEmpty() && DnsSdService::CheckName( eName ) == false) )
00285         {
00286                 return false;
00287         }
00288 
00289         // Length of eNAme is checked by DnsSdService::CheckName
00290         SearchNameLength = 0;
00291         for( ;SearchNameLength < (int)eName.GetLength(); SearchNameLength++ )
00292         {
00293                 SearchName[SearchNameLength] = eName[SearchNameLength];
00294         }
00295         SearchName[SearchNameLength] = '\0';
00296 
00297         // we must at least put a name or give a callback
00298         // in all other case, we can not choose a service !
00299         if ( SearchNameLength == 0 && eCallBack == NULL )
00300         {
00301                 return false;
00302         }
00303 
00304         Parent = eParent;
00305         DNSSocket = (SOCKET)SOCKET_ERROR;
00306         DNSSDConnection = false;
00307 
00308 
00309         CallBack = eCallBack;
00310         UserData = eUserData;
00311 
00312         // If no proxy is running, launch DnsSdConnection
00313         if ( DnsSdProxy::IsEnabled() == false )
00314         {
00315                 if ( DNSServiceBrowse(&Ref,0,0,eRegType.GetStr(),"",SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply,this) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00316                 {
00317                         DNSSocket = DNSServiceRefSockFD( Ref );
00318                         DNSSDConnection = true;
00319                         return true;
00320                 }
00321                 // here we do not get an answer
00322                 return false;
00323         }
00324         return true;
00325 }
00326 
00327 int WaitForDnsSdServices::NeedService( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eRegType, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack, void * eUserData )
00328 {
00329         int PosOfNewSearchService;
00330         SearchService * pNewSearchService = new SearchService;
00331 
00332         ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00333 
00334         if ( pNewSearchService == NULL ) 
00335         {
00336                 ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00337                 return -1;
00338         }
00339 
00340         if ( pNewSearchService->StartSearch( eName, eRegType, this, eCallBack, eUserData ) == false )
00341         {
00342                 // Could not start search, destroy search service
00343                 delete pNewSearchService;
00344                 ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00345                 return -1;
00346         }
00347 
00348         // Everything fine, so add it to my search list
00349         SearchServices.Add(pNewSearchService);
00350 
00351         // compute virtual position of service
00352         PosOfNewSearchService = SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() - 1;
00353         
00354         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00355 
00356         return PosOfNewSearchService; // Information about the service pos in the table
00357 }
00358 
00359 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE WaitForDnsSdServices::Run()
00360 {
00361         fd_set fds;
00362         int nReady;
00363         timeval timeout;
00364         int MaxDesc = 0;        // Maximal descriptor for the select function
00365         int NumberOfSearchServices = 0;
00366 
00367         if ( DnsSdProxy::IsEnabled() )
00368         {
00369                 DnsSdServicesList * pList;      // List Of Services comming from the DnsSdProxy
00370 
00371                 // We work until the end using a Dns proxy
00372                 while(  !StopPending()  )
00373                 {
00374                         ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00375 
00376                         NumberOfSearchServices = SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00377                         if ( NumberOfSearchServices == 0 || NbServicesReady == NumberOfSearchServices )
00378                         {
00379                                 ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00380                                 Sleep(10);
00381                                 continue;
00382                         }
00383 
00384                         pList = DnsSdProxy::GetCurrentServicesList();
00385                         if ( pList != NULL )
00386                         {
00387                                 // Find the readable sockets, first version, must be improve
00388                                 // printf( "%u;", GetTickCount() );
00389                                 for( SearchServices.First(); SearchServices.NotAtEnd(); SearchServices.Next() )
00390                                 {
00391                                         if ( SearchServices.GetCurrent()->IsResolved )
00392                                         {
00393                                                 continue;
00394                                         }
00395                                         for( pList->First(); pList->NotAtEnd(); pList->Next() )
00396                                         {
00397                                                 if ( StopPending() || NbServicesReady == NumberOfSearchServices )
00398                                                 {
00399                                                         // Go out of the 2 for at the same time.
00400                                                         goto AllFound;
00401                                                 }
00402                                                 SearchServices.GetCurrent()->DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( kDNSServiceFlagsAdd, *(pList->GetCurrent()) );
00403                                         }
00404                                 }
00405                         AllFound:
00406 
00407                                 // delete the list
00408                                 delete pList;
00409                         }
00410                         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00411 
00412                         // Wait for DnsSd Changes
00413                         DnsSdProxy::WaitForChanges(30);
00414                 }
00415         }
00416         else
00417         {
00418                 // Work using connxions to DnsSd
00419                 while(  !StopPending()  )
00420                 {
00421                         ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00422 
00423                         NumberOfSearchServices = SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00424                         if ( NumberOfSearchServices == 0 || NbServicesReady == NumberOfSearchServices )
00425                         {
00426                                 ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00427                                 Sleep(10);      // 30 ms
00428                                 continue;
00429                         }
00430 
00431                         FD_ZERO(&fds);
00432 
00433                         MaxDesc = 0;
00434 
00435                         // Initiate DNS SD Connection
00436                         timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00437                         timeout.tv_usec = 30000;        // 10ms
00438 
00439                         for( SearchServices.First(); SearchServices.NotAtEnd(); SearchServices.Next() )
00440                         {
00441                                 FD_SET( SearchServices.GetCurrent()->DNSSocket, &fds );
00442 #ifndef WIN32
00443                                 // On unix we must give the max fd value + one
00444                                 if ( SearchServices.GetCurrent()->DNSSocket > MaxDesc )
00445                                 {
00446                                         MaxDesc = SearchServices.GetCurrent()->DNSSocket;
00447                                 }
00448 #endif
00449                         }
00450 
00451 #ifndef WIN32
00452                         MaxDesc = MaxDesc+1;
00453 #else
00454                         // On WIN32 plateform, the value is unused and remain 0
00455 #endif
00456 
00457                 nReady = select(MaxDesc, &fds, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00458 
00459                         // if at least 1 socket is readable...
00460                         if ( nReady > 0 )
00461                         {
00462                                 // Find the readable sockets
00463                                 for( SearchServices.First(); !StopPending() && SearchServices.NotAtEnd(); SearchServices.Next() )
00464                                 {
00465                                         if ( FD_ISSET( SearchServices.GetCurrent()->DNSSocket, &fds ) )
00466                                         {
00467                                                 // Process the result
00468                                                 DNSServiceProcessResult(SearchServices.GetCurrent()->Ref);
00469                                         }
00470                                 }
00471                         }
00472 
00473                         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00474                 }
00475         }
00476 }

00478 
00479 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::WaitAll( unsigned int DelayMax )
00480 {
00481         bool Done;
00482 
00483         if ( DelayMax == 0 )
00484         {
00485                 // INFINITE wait
00486                 Done = false;
00487                 for(;;)
00488                 {
00489                         // Is the work done ?
00490                         ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00491                         Done = NbServicesReady == (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00492                         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00493 
00494                         if ( Done == true )
00495                         {
00496                                 return true;
00497                         }
00498 
00499                         // Wait
00500                         Sleep( 10 );
00501                 }
00502         }
00503         else
00504         {
00505                 ElapsedTime CountWaitedTime;
00506                 Done = false;
00507                 for(;;)
00508                 {
00509                         // Is the work done ?
00510                         ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00511                         Done = NbServicesReady == (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00512                         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00513 
00514                         if ( Done == true || CountWaitedTime.Get() >= DelayMax )
00515                         {
00516                                 return true;
00517                         }
00518 
00519                         Sleep( 10 );
00520                 }
00521         }
00522         return true;
00523 }
00524 
00525 int WaitForDnsSdServices::GetNbOfSearchedServices()
00526 {
00527         int res;
00528 
00529         ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00530         res = (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00531         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00532 
00533         return res;
00534 }
00535 
00536 SearchService & WaitForDnsSdServices::operator[](int nPos)
00537 {
00538         int i;
00539         SearchService * pSearchService = NULL;
00540 
00541         ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00542 
00543         if ( nPos < 0 || nPos >= (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() )
00544         {
00545                 ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00546                 throw ServiceException( "Out of band" ) ;
00547         }
00548 
00549         // Search in the list and return the value
00550         for( i = 0, SearchServices.First(); SearchServices.NotAtEnd(); i++, SearchServices.Next() )
00551         {
00552                 if ( i == nPos )
00553                 {
00554                         pSearchService = SearchServices.GetCurrent();
00555                 }
00556         }
00557         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00558 
00559         return *pSearchService;
00560 }
00561 
00562 bool SearchService::IsAvailable()
00563 {
00564         return (IsResolved == false);
00565 }
